tns:patch.author: Dolghier Constantin
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_ni_donor_orgbudget_code; CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_ni_donor_orgbudget_code AS SELECT d.amp_activity_id, orgs.budget_org_code AS budget_org_code, d.terms_assist_id, d.financing_instrument_id, d.donor_org_id, d.mode_of_payment_id, d.funding_status_id, d.agreement_id, d.funding_id, d.vulnerable_group_id, d.project_results_available_id, d.donor_org_country_id FROM v_ni_donor_orgs d JOIN ni_all_orgs_dimension orgs ON orgs.org_id = d.org_id;
